report.title: EBMS App sections list report
report.description: Lists sections to be used in the App.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM detail_locations l #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND l.parent_id IN (#location_list#) #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: l.id AS id, l.name AS name, l.code AS code, l.centroid_sref AS centroid_sref, l.centroid_sref_system AS sref_system, CASE WHEN boundary_geom IS NULL THEN st_asgeojson(centroid_geom) ELSE st_asgeojson(boundary_geom) END as geom

param.name: website_id
param.display: Website Id for the occurrence record.

param.name: location_list
param.display: Comma separated list of parent location ids.
